</Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uj0WiOFsNcpK_veDH4e2-21" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="720" y="80" width="100" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uj0WiOFsNcpK_veDH4e2-23" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="710" y="290" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uj0WiOFsNcpK_veDH4e2-24" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="760" y="270" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uj0WiOFsNcpK_veDH4e2-25" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="804" y="270" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uj0WiOFsNcpK_veDH4e2-27" value="restaurent-container" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="710" y="40" width="130" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uj0WiOFsNcpK_veDH4e2-28" value="3 restaurant cards" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="860" y="210" width="110" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uj0WiOFsNcpK_veDH4e2-29" value="==Filtering using UseState===&gt;" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="490" y="170" width="200" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uj0WiOFsNcpK_veDH4e2-30" value="<h1>Reconciliation Algorithm</h1><p>How react re-renders the component upon changes in state variable&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="10" width="190" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uj0WiOFsNcpK_veDH4e2-31" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;">React stores the whole component in the form of a virtual DOM</font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="150" y="381" width="730" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uj0WiOFsNcpK_veDH4e2-32" value="<h1>Virtual Dom</h1><div style="font-size: 16px;"><font style="font-size: 16px;"><br></font></div><div style="font-size: 16px;"><font style="font-size: 16px;">Its basically JS object and its representation of actual object&nbsp;</font></div><div style="font-size: 16px;"><font style="font-size: 16px;"><br></font></div><div style="font-size: 16px;"><font style="font-size: 16px;">console.log(componetName);</font></div><div style="font-size: 16px;"><font style="font-size: 16px;"><br></font></div><div style="font-size: 16px;"><font style="font-size: 16px;">&nbsp;will show the virtual dom which is the representation of actual dom.</font></div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="650" y="430" width="360" height="210" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uj0WiOFsNcpK_veDH4e2-33" value="<h1>Actual Dom</h1><p style="font-size: 16px;"><font style="font-size: 16px;">&lt;div class ="res-container"&gt;</font></p><blockquote style="margin: 0px 0px 0px 40px; border: none; padding: 0px; font-size: 16px;"><p><font style="font-size: 16px;">&lt;div class ="res-card"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;<br>&lt;div class ="res-card"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;<br>&lt;div class ="res-card"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;<br>&lt;div class ="res-card"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;<br></font></p></blockquote><p style="font-size: 16px;"><font style="font-size: 16px;">&lt;/div&gt;</font><br></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="90" y="440" width="440" height="210" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uj0WiOFsNcpK_veDH4e2-34" value="<h1>Diff Algorithm<br></h1><div><font style="font-size: 16px;">The Diff alogirmth finds the difference between the older virtual dom and the updated virtual dom.</font></div><div><font style="font-size: 16px;"><br></font></div><div><font style="font-size: 16px;">Once the state is changed a new object is formed which is the new virtual dom.<br><br></font></div><div><font style="font-size: 16px;">Now reacts finds the difference between these 2 objects (old virtual dom and new virtual dom)</font></div><div><font style="font-size: 16px;"><br></font></div><div><font style="font-size: 16px;">Then updates the Actual DOM.</font></div><div><font style="font-size: 16px;">&nbsp;</font></div><div><font style="font-size: 16px;"><br><br></font></div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=5;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="700" width="960" height="210" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.font: The Diff alogirmth finds the difference between the older virtual dom and the updated virtual dom.
Once the state is changed a new object is formed which is the new virtual dom.
Now reacts finds the difference between these 2 objects (old virtual dom and new virtual dom)

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
